body: No boy could resist unloading into her
Why haven't it fixxed now, this is not yuri!!!!!!!!

That's because people over at exhentai where all the shit here is taken from put whatever tags they feel like. Either their brains don't function or they are doing this out of spite for the sites that scrape off of them.

.....wow, this is tagged wrong. (For a moment when I entered, I thought it was Shotacon, from the first page...then I saw the Tag: Yuri and assumed the Shota was a Girl...only to see the Last Page with the Demon Queen's creampie and realized it WAS Shotacon!).....who...who tagged this! I get tagging shit wrong is a fact of life at this point. But HOW THE FUCK DID YURI COME TO MIND WHEN IT GOT TAGGED LIKE THAT (Mistaking something for NTR when you can't read the language is one thing! But where in this story was there "another female?")
